stories.title: Google is committing $10B to advance cybersecurity

stories.text:
I work in a Fortune 500 tech company in the Bay Area. Recently, I lost my mother to COVID in my home country and had to visit home to perform the funeral etc. Also, I have a young family here in the CA with a 3 year old child in autism spectrum.

I am feeling overwhelmed by the whole situation and need some guidance/pointers on how to cope with this. My spouse is very supportive but we both need some kind of professional help to avoid burnout. Any advice/help would be totally appreciated. Thanks hackers.
stories.title: Ask HN: Dealing with Family Loss

stories.text: I'm a student at a university and have been asked to become a team leader for a club writing software. Are there any books/ readings that cover leadership and collaboration that you would suggest?
stories.title: Ask HN: Resources to Learn Team Management

stories.text:
I have a job board I am building with some people, and to begin gaining traction we bulk uploaded current employers we work with for them to later verify their profiles (about 50,000 so far). We have tried some simple GPT-3 description generation, for the company descriptions, with a few variations but with 50,000+ employers we are getting penalized with low content pages and soft 404s on certain profiles.

I am looking for strategies or work-arounds to do bulk profile/url uploads and avoid being penalized for low content, duplicate content, soft 404s, etc.

It may be helpful to add that these employers are in the same industry, and their differences are names, websites, and phone numbers. We have looked at beefing up internal linking but are open to any suggestions.

Thank you - notgeorge
stories.title: How to bulk upload profiles/URLs and avoid low content pages â€“ SEO
